definition: Mt Ba in eastern Sichuan
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
rain on Mt Ba (idiom); lonely in a strange land/Evening Rain, 1980 movie about the Cultural Revolution
Choibalsan, city in Mongolia, capital of the eastern aimag (province) of Dornod/Khorloogiin Choibalsan (1895-1952), Communist leader of the Mongolian People's Republic (mid-1930s-1952)
mountains and rivers of Sichuan (idiom)
to climb hills and pass over mountains (idiom); to cross mountain after mountain/good at climbing mountains

sentences.english: Aim Studies on the insecta biodiversities of Qinling-Bashan Mountains Area.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究秦巴山区昆虫生物多样性。

sentences.english: Source rocks are widely developed in foreland of Daba Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 大巴山前陆构造发育多套烃源岩。

sentences.english: Dabashan Mountain frontal border is a platform depression on the north verge of Upper Yangzi Platform.
sentences.chinese: 大巴山前缘为上扬子准地台北缘的一个台缘拗陷。

sentences.english: Bashan Mountain and Micang Mountain are clustered into two paratactic groups.
sentences.chinese: 巴山与米仓山被聚为并列的两组。

sentences.english: It was claimed that P, henryi should be considered as an independent species.
sentences.chinese: 作者认为，巴山松作为一个独立的种是成立的。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of family conditions on children's mental development in Qinba mountainous region.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究秦巴山区家庭状况对儿童智力发育的影响。

sentences.english: Suggestions on the development of bio-energy industry in the region were put forward.
sentences.chinese: 对秦巴山区生物能源产业的发展提出了建议。

sentences.english: The Qinba Mountain Area is one of the regions with high affecting of mental retardation (MR) in China.
sentences.chinese: 秦巴山区是我国精神发育迟滞病症的高发区之一。

sentences.english: The basic situations of the plants were summarized.
sentences.chinese: 汇总了秦巴山区生物能源植物资源的基本情况。

sentences.english: The endless rain filled the pools on this autumn night.
sentences.chinese: 巴山的夜里下着绵绵的秋雨，池塘都已经涨满了水。

sentences.english: As a sum, Mr. Zhou had taken a wild tiger at Daba mountain.
sentences.chinese: 总之，周先生在大巴山摄到一只野生老虎。

definition: Qinling mountain range in Shaanxi forming natural barrier between Guanzhong plain 關中平原|关中平原[Guan1 zhong1 ping2 yuan2] and Han River 漢水|汉水[Han4 shui3] valley
Zhongnan mountains, near Xi'an
Mt Wu on the Changjiang River (Yangtze) by the Three Gorges
Wushan county in Wanzhou suburbs of north Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
Jiange county in Guangyuan 廣元|广元[Guang3 yuan2], Sichuan
Sichuan/originally two provinces of Qin and Han
mountains and rivers of Sichuan (idiom)
Wuxia Gorge on the Changjiang or Yangtze, the middle of the Three Gorges 三峽|三峡[San1 Xia2]
Han River (Hanshui)
Guangyuan prefecture-level city in Sichuan
Luonan County in Shangluo 商洛[Shang1 luo4], Shaanxi
Qinling mountain range in Shaanxi forming natural barrier between Guanzhong plain 關中平原|关中平原 and Han River 汉水 valley
Chishui county level city in Zunyi 遵義|遵义[Zun1 yi4], Guizhou
Zhongnan Mountains, near Xi'an/also known as the Taiyi Mountains
Mount Qingcheng
Nanzheng County in Hanzhong 漢中|汉中[Han4 zhong1], Shaanxi
Jialing river in Sichuan (a tributary of the Yangtze)
